issue-description: From the Diabolo Headband PDP, clicking on the Black variant redirects the user to a broken page
issue-fix-1c: The page might be down due to a server issue. Check the server status and logs to identify and resolve any errors.
issue-fix-2c: Essential files like HTML, CSS, or JavaScript may be missing or corrupted. Verify the file integrity and restore any missing or damaged files.
issue-fix-3c: The page might not load due to incorrect routing or URL mapping. Review the routing configuration and ensure the URL points to the correct page.
issue-fix-4c: Conflicts between scripts or plugins could be causing the page to break. Disable or update conflicting plugins or scripts to resolve the issue.
issue-fix-5c: The page might not render correctly in certain browsers. Test the page across different browsers and fix any compatibility issues.

issue-type: Product Page Taken Offline by Error
issue-description: From the Ballon De Cartier page, clicking on the ballon blanc recommended products redirect to a missing page
issue-fix-1c: Check in your CMS to see if the broken link here is the latest link to that product page.
issue-fix-2c: Connect your inventory data in FocalStudio to cross reference with offline product pages.

issue-type: Product Page Taken Offline by Error
issue-description: From the ballon bleu PDP, clicking on the ballon Bleu Small model redirect to a missing page
issue-fix-1c: Use a tool like UptimeRobot or Pingdom to monitor the availability of key product pages.
issue-fix-2h: Automated Inventory vs. Page Status Comparison
issue-fix-2c: Create a script that checks if pages with inventory are live.

issue-description: The Love Necklace 3 Diamonds PDP takes 4 seconds to load, significantly longer than average
issue-fix-1c: Large images, videos, or scripts could be slowing down the page. Optimize and compress these assets to improve load times.
issue-fix-2c: Too many requests can delay the page load. Combine files where possible, and use asynchronous loading for scripts.
issue-fix-3c: Poorly written code or lack of minification can affect performance. Review and refactor the code to streamline loading.
issue-fix-4c: A slow server response can lead to delays. Consider upgrading hosting or using a content delivery network (CDN) to distribute the load.

issue-description: The Diamond Collection Page header contains a broken image, with no placeholder in it's place
issue-fix-1c: The product page may be incomplete or missing essential elements like images or descriptions.

issue-product: L'Odyssée de Cartier on Main Brand Vision Page
issue-description: The link to the page from https://www.cartier.com/fr-fr/collections/watchmaking/vision is broken
issue-fix-1c: The URL might be incorrect or outdated. Verify and update the link to point to the correct destination.
issue-fix-2c: The target page may have been deleted or moved. Ensure that the page still exists or create a proper redirect to the new location.
issue-fix-3c: Minor errors in the URL structure can break a link. Double-check for any typos or formatting mistakes.
issue-fix-4c: If the link points to an external site, it may have been changed or removed. Contact the external site owner or find an alternative resource.

issue-product: Baignoire Watch in Summer Gifts page
issue-description: The link to the page from https://www.cartier.com/en-us/gifts/summer.html is broken
issue-fix-1c: The product recommendation may be pointing to an outdated or incorrect URL.
issue-fix-2c: The recommended product might no longer be available on the website. Verify inventory data.
